title.rendered: Acclime looking at HK listing despite PE proposals to avoid too much dilution

content.rendered:
Martin Crawford, founder and CEO of Acclime, gave an interview to Market Merger in which he discussed Acclime’s visions for listing in Hong Kong. Market Merger published the article on May 31st, 2021, and Acuris have given us permission to share the PDF with you.

The article describes how Acclime is managing its own roll-up strategy in a way that can lead to an initial public offering (IPO) without raising additional equity funding. It also explains Acclime’s strategy to continue acquiring businesses in a way that avoids too much dilution.

Martin Crawford’s explanation of how Acclime’s acquisitions have been targeted and financed makes interesting reading.
